body_html:
Hi @ngimel,

I don't know if you had troubles updating your cmake or not but I had the same issue as you mentioned moments ago when I was building my container, and I had updated the cmake 3.5.1 to cmake 3.11.3 and it worked like a charm without any pain.

sudo apt purge cmake -y
wget https://cmake.org/files/v3.11/cmake-3.11.3-Linux-x86_64.tar.gz -O $HOME/cmake-3.11.3-Linux-x86_64.tar.gz
tar -xvf cmake-3.11.3-Linux-x86_64.tar.gz -C $HOME/
cd $HOME/cmake-3.11.3-Linux-x86_64
sudo cp -r bin /usr/
sudo cp -r share /usr/
sudo cp -r doc /usr/share/
sudo cp -r man /usr/share/
cd .. && rm -rf $HOME/cmake-3.11.3-Linux-x86_64

Then I built pytorch 0.5 after it and it's also working.

body:
Hi @ngimel,

I don't know if you had troubles updating your cmake or not but I had the same issue as you mentioned moments ago when I was building my container, and I had updated the cmake 3.5.1 to cmake 3.11.3 and it worked like a charm without any pain.

```
sudo apt purge cmake -y
wget https://cmake.org/files/v3.11/cmake-3.11.3-Linux-x86_64.tar.gz -O $HOME/cmake-3.11.3-Linux-x86_64.tar.gz
tar -xvf cmake-3.11.3-Linux-x86_64.tar.gz -C $HOME/
cd $HOME/cmake-3.11.3-Linux-x86_64
sudo cp -r bin /usr/
sudo cp -r share /usr/
sudo cp -r doc /usr/share/
sudo cp -r man /usr/share/
cd .. && rm -rf $HOME/cmake-3.11.3-Linux-x86_64
```

Then I built pytorch 0.5 after it and it's also working.
